response.name: Delete user by id
Get all FAQ's
response.body:
[
    {
        "_id": "1",
        "question": "Who is this application for?",
        "answer": "Budget planning application is for adults who care about their financial state, want to know where they spend money",
        "createdAt": "2022-03-15T05:34:20.475Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-03-15T05:34:20.475Z",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "2",
        "question": "What allows us this kind of app?",
        "answer": "Budget Planning App is a web-application that allows you to: keep track of income and expenses in the context of various categories, set limits for expenses and get notifications when you spend too much, generate different types of reports with detailed cost analytics, organize the accounting of savings, store electronic copies of financial documents.",
        "createdAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:00.621Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:00.621Z",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "3",
        "question": "Is there implemented login functioanlity?",
        "answer": "Yes, of course ^_^",
        "createdAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:31.212Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:31.212Z",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "4",
        "question": "Can I generate administrator`s reports?",
        "answer": "Yes",
        "createdAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:52.609Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-03-15T05:35:52.609Z",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "5",
        "question": "Can we set limits for expenses?",
        "answer": "Yes",
        "createdAt": "2022-03-15T05:36:14.777Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-03-15T05:36:14.777Z",
        "__v": 0
    }
]
